verses.verse: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician לְדָוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> of David מִזְמ֑וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD חֲ֝קַרְתַּ֗נִי <S%H2713><s%> thou hast searched וַתֵּדָֽע׃ <S%H3045><s%> me and known

אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> You יָ֭דַעְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> Thou knowest שִׁבְתִּ֣י <S%H3427><s%> my downsitting וְקוּמִ֑י <S%H6965><s%> and mine uprising בַּ֥נְתָּה <S%H995><s%> thou understandest לְ֝רֵעִ֗י <S%H7454><s%> my thought מֵרָחֽוֹק׃ <S%H7350><s%> afar off

אָרְחִ֣י <S%H734><s%> my path וְרִבְעִ֣י <S%H7252><s%> and my lying down זֵרִ֑יתָ <S%H2219><s%> Thou compassest וְֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דְּרָכַ֥י <S%H1870><s%> [with] all my ways הִסְכַּֽנְתָּה׃ <S%H5532><s%> and art acquainted

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> before אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> there מִ֭לָּה <S%H4405><s%> For [there is] not a word בִּלְשׁוֹנִ֑י <S%H3956><s%> in my tongue הֵ֥ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> [but] lo O LORD יָדַ֥עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> thou knowest כֻלָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3605><s%> all

אָח֣וֹר <S%H268><s%> me behind וָקֶ֣דֶם <S%H6924><s%> and before צַרְתָּ֑נִי <S%H6696><s%> Thou hast beset וַתָּ֖שֶׁת <S%H7896><s%> and laid עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> and כַּפֶּֽכָה׃ <S%H3709><s%> thine hand

[פִּלְאִיָּה כ] (פְּלִ֣יאָֽה <S%H6383><s%> secret ק) דַ֣עַת <S%H1847><s%> [Such] knowledge מִמֶּ֑נִּי <S%H4480><s%> is too נִ֝שְׂגְּבָ֗ה <S%H7682><s%> for me it is high לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not א֥וּכַֽל <S%H3201><s%> I cannot לָֽהּ׃
אָ֭נָ֥ה <S%H575><s%> Where אֵלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go מֵרוּחֶ֑ךָ <S%H7307><s%> air וְ֝אָ֗נָה <S%H575><s%> Where מִפָּנֶ֥יךָ <S%H6440><s%> accept אֶבְרָֽח׃ <S%H1272><s%> flee

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If אֶסַּ֣ק <S%H5266><s%> If I ascend up שָׁ֭מַיִם <S%H8064><s%> into heaven שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> are there אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> I וְאַצִּ֖יעָה <S%H3331><s%> thou [art] there if I make my bed שְּׁא֣וֹל <S%H7585><s%> in hell הִנֶּֽךָּ׃ <S%H2005><s%> behold

אֶשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> [If] I take כַנְפֵי־ <S%H3671><s%> the wings שָׁ֑חַר <S%H7837><s%> of the morning אֶ֝שְׁכְּנָ֗ה <S%H7931><s%> [and] dwell בְּאַחֲרִ֥ית <S%H319><s%> in the uttermost parts יָֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> of the sea

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Even שָׁ֭ם <S%H8033><s%> there יָדְךָ֣ <S%H3027><s%> Even there shall thy hand תַנְחֵ֑נִי <S%H5148><s%> lead וְֽתֹאחֲזֵ֥נִי <S%H270><s%> shall hold יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3225><s%> me and thy right hand

וָ֭אֹמַר <S%H559><s%> If I say אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> Surely חֹ֣שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> Surely the darkness יְשׁוּפֵ֑נִי <S%H7779><s%> shall cover וְ֝לַ֗יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> me even the night א֣וֹר <S%H216><s%> shall be light בַּעֲדֵֽנִי׃ <S%H1157><s%> about me

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Even חֹשֶׁךְ֮ <S%H2822><s%> Yea the darkness לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not יַחְשִׁ֪יךְ <S%H2821><s%> hideth מִ֫מֶּ֥ךָ <S%H4480><s%> to You וְ֭לַיְלָה <S%H3915><s%> not from thee but the night כַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> as the day יָאִ֑יר <S%H215><s%> shineth כַּ֝חֲשֵׁיכָ֗ה <S%H2825><s%> the darkness כָּאוֹרָֽה׃ <S%H219><s%> and the light

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַ֭תָּה <S%H859><s%> You קָנִ֣יתָ <S%H7069><s%> For thou hast possessed כִלְיֹתָ֑י <S%H3629><s%> my reins תְּ֝סֻכֵּ֗נִי <S%H5526><s%> thou hast covered בְּבֶ֣טֶן <S%H990><s%> womb אִמִּֽי׃ <S%H517><s%> me in my mother's

אֽוֹדְךָ֗ <S%H3034><s%> I will praise עַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> and כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for נוֹרָא֗וֹת <S%H3372><s%> thee for I am fearfully נִ֫פְלֵ֥יתִי <S%H6395><s%> [and] wonderfully made נִפְלָאִ֥ים <S%H6381><s%> marvellous מַעֲשֶׂ֑יךָ <S%H4639><s%> [are] thy works וְ֝נַפְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> and [that] my soul יֹדַ֥עַת <S%H3045><s%> knoweth מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> right well

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> was not נִכְחַ֥ד <S%H3582><s%> was not hid עָצְמִ֗י <S%H6108><s%> My substance מִ֫מֶּ֥ךָּ <S%H4480><s%> at אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> When עֻשֵּׂ֥יתִי <S%H6213><s%> from thee when I was made בַסֵּ֑תֶר <S%H5643><s%> in secret רֻ֝קַּ֗מְתִּי <S%H7551><s%> [and] curiously wrought בְּֽתַחְתִּיּ֥וֹת <S%H8482><s%> in the lowest parts אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

גָּלְמִ֤י ׀ <S%H1564><s%> my substance yet being unperfect רָ֘א֤וּ <S%H7200><s%> did see עֵינֶ֗יךָ <S%H5869><s%> Thine eyes וְעַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> and in סִפְרְךָ֮ <S%H5612><s%> and in thy book כֻּלָּ֪ם <S%H3605><s%> were all יִכָּ֫תֵ֥בוּ <S%H3789><s%> all [my members] were written יָמִ֥ים <S%H3117><s%> [which] in continuance יֻצָּ֑רוּ <S%H3335><s%> were fashioned [וְלֹא כ] (וְלֹ֖ו <S%H3808><s%> not ק) אֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> when [as yet there was] none בָּהֶֽם׃

וְלִ֗י מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> How יָּקְר֣וּ <S%H3365><s%> How precious רֵעֶ֣יךָ <S%H7454><s%> also are thy thoughts אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> unto me O God מֶ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> How עָ֝צְמוּ <S%H6105><s%> how great רָאשֵׁיהֶֽם׃ <S%H7218><s%> is the sum

אֶ֭סְפְּרֵם <S%H5608><s%> [If] I should count מֵח֣וֹל <S%H2344><s%> than the sand יִרְבּ֑וּן <S%H7235><s%> them they are more in number הֱ֝קִיצֹ֗תִי <S%H6974><s%> when I awake וְעוֹדִ֥י <S%H5750><s%> I am still עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> O תִּקְטֹ֖ל <S%H6991><s%> Surely thou wilt slay אֱל֥וֹהַּ ׀ <S%H433><s%> O God רָשָׁ֑ע <S%H7563><s%> the wicked וְאַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H582><s%> men דָ֝מִ֗ים <S%H1818><s%> from me therefore ye bloody ס֣וּרוּ <S%H5493><s%> depart מֶֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> they יֹ֭אמְרֻךָ <S%H559><s%> For they speak לִמְזִמָּ֑ה <S%H4209><s%> against thee wickedly נָשֻׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> take לַשָּׁ֣וְא <S%H7723><s%> [thy name] in vain עָרֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6145><s%> [and] thine enemies

הֲלֽוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not מְשַׂנְאֶ֖יךָ <S%H8130><s%> Do not I hate יְהוָ֥ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> them O LORD אֶשְׂנָ֑א <S%H8130><s%> that hate וּ֝בִתְקוֹמְמֶ֗יךָ <S%H8618><s%> with those that rise up אֶתְקוֹטָֽט׃ <S%H6962><s%> thee? and am not I grieved
תַּכְלִ֣ית <S%H8503><s%> them with perfect שִׂנְאָ֣ה <S%H8135><s%> hatred שְׂנֵאתִ֑ים <S%H8130><s%> I hate לְ֝אוֹיְבִ֗ים <S%H341><s%> I count them mine enemies הָ֣יוּ <S%H1961><s%> have become לִֽי׃

חָקְרֵ֣נִי <S%H2713><s%> Search אֵ֭ל <S%H410><s%> me O God וְדַ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> and know לְבָבִ֑י <S%H3824><s%> my heart בְּ֝חָנֵ֗נִי <S%H974><s%> try וְדַ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> me and know שַׂרְעַפָּֽי׃ <S%H8312><s%> my thoughts

וּרְאֵ֗ה <S%H7200><s%> And see אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> way עֹ֥צֶב <S%H6090><s%> if [there be any] wicked בִּ֑י וּ֝נְחֵ֗נִי <S%H5148><s%> in me and lead בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> me in the way עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> everlasting
